p:
In the New England Journal of Medicine, Vaduganathan et al. discuss the potential beneficial effects of ACEIs and ARBs in COVID-19.
9 They state that SARS-CoV-2 appears to down-regulate ACE2 functions and that it has been postulated that ACE2 deficiency induces unabated AngII activity, which may be in part responsible for organ njury in COVID-19.
